select tp.pr_no, tp.pr_brand, tp.pr_name, tp.pr_price, tp.pr_create_dt, tp.pr_modify_dt, tp.pr_status, tp.prc_no, tp.se_no, tpf.prf_uuid as thumbnail, tpc.prc_path_name as categoryPathName, tpc.prc_path_no as categoryPathNo FROM tbl_product tp LEFT JOIN tbl_product_file tpf ON tp.pr_no = tpf.pr_no LEFT JOIN tbl_product_category tpc ON tp.prc_no = tpc.prc_no WHERE tp.pr_status != 'DELETE' AND tp.pr_no = #{prNo} ORDER BY tpf.prf_status desc LIMIT 1;

SELECT DISTINCT tp.pr_no, tp.pr_brand, tp.pr_name, tp.pr_price, tp.pr_create_dt, tp.pr_modify_dt, tp.pr_status, tp.prc_no, tp.se_no, tpc.prc_path_name as categoryPathName, ( SELECT tpf.prf_uuid FROM tbl_product_file tpf WHERE tpf.pr_no = tp.pr_no ORDER BY tpf.prf_status DESC LIMIT 1 ) AS thumbnail FROM tbl_product tp LEFT JOIN tbl_product_category tpc ON tp.prc_no = tpc.prc_no WHERE tp.se_no = #{seNo} AND tp.pr_status != 'DELETE' AND tp.pr_create_dt BETWEEN #{productPageSearchRequestDTO.startDt} AND DATE_ADD(#{productPageSearchRequestDTO.endDt}, INTERVAL 1 DAY)
ORDER BY pr_no DESC LIMIT #{productPageSearchRequestDTO.skip}, #{productPageSearchRequestDTO.size}

SELECT count(*) FROM tbl_product tp WHERE tp.se_no = #{seNo} AND tp.pr_status != 'DELETE' AND tp.pr_create_dt BETWEEN #{productPageSearchRequestDTO.startDt} AND DATE_ADD(#{productPageSearchRequestDTO.endDt}, INTERVAL 1 DAY)
